title: Introduction to React
content: React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Its aim is to allow developers to easily create fast user interfaces for websites and applications alike.

comments.content: You can create a new react app in the current directory by using 'npx create-react-app .'😄
It is easy to learn and use!

title: [React] Conditional Rendering
content: In React, you can create distinct components that encapuslate behavior you need. Then, you can render only some of them, depending on the state of your application.

comments.content: Conditional rendering in React works the same way conditions work in JavaScript.
I've used only inline If-Else with Conditional Operator. Now I learned that I can use inline If with Logical && Operator!
I am write code using this!!
